name: Virtual Hunting Experience
description:
Virtual Hunting Experience offers hunters the chance at unique hunting simulations full of animals and with no limits. Be careful because not all animals are friendly! Hunt over 5 locations for over 30+ animal species, collect trophy animals, and unlock new weapons.

-Choose between Day and Night hunting which change the animal that spawn and some animal behaviors.

- Full hunt Journal to keep track of trophy animals and other hunting stats!

-Score breakdown after each hunt, rack up big money to buy new weapons.

-Choose from 6 different locations and shoot for high scores!
